result.execSummary:
Miguel Angel Avila was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Miguel Angel Avila was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Miguel Angel Avila

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Miguel Angel Avila not in court.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP  
Defendant has been turned over to the State of Oklahoma.
On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

Defendant Miguel Angel Avila in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Miguel Angel Avila in custody.  Joshua Miles Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  HMP
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Donald, Branch 02.  
Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Donald, Branch 2.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Oklahoma.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant remanded into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for February 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
